name: Aclean
description:
备份 Acfun 2018-03-26
首页精简，文章区去侧栏
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain("www.acfun.cn")
{/*首页
  搜索栏调整*/
  ::-moz-placeholder
  {font-size:0px !important;}
  .search-box .search-result
  {display:none !important;} 
  /*手机app,游戏中心,扭蛋,信用卡,模块小字,右侧top,水聊版,预览图弹幕,广告,香蕉榜编号,备案,备案*/
  [class*="-app" ],
  .gameIcon,
  .niudanIcon,
  .creditCard,
  B + P,
  #to-top,
  #J_chat_btn,
  .space-danmaku,
  .area-ad a,
  .area-banana-rank .block-top,
  .clearfix.footer-link,
  #explain 
  {display:none !important;} 
  /*模块屏蔽
  娱乐,游戏,舞蹈,彼女,鱼塘,科技,体育,音乐*/
  .wp.area-channel-big[data-cid="60"],
  .wp.area-channel-big[data-cid="59"],
  .wp.area-channel-middle[data-cid="123"],
  .wp.area-channel-middle[data-cid="124"],
  .wp.area-channel-middle[data-cid="125"],
  .wp.area-channel-middle[data-cid="70"],
  .wp.area-channel-middle[data-cid="69"],
  .wp.area-channel-middle[data-cid="58"]
  {display:none !important;}
}
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.acfun.cn/v/")
{/*播放界面
 分享,客户端,app下载,手机观看,相关视频,反馈,扭蛋*/ 
  section.ad-header,
  .jiathis_style_32x32,
  #a-app-guide,
  #app-download-toolbar,
  #bd_phoneshow,
  #block-recom-view,
  #feedback,
  #goniudan
  {display:none !important;}
}
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.acfun.cn/a/")
{/*文章区
  头部横幅,右侧栏,分享*/
  #head-banner,
  .content.wp.clearfix.area .fr,
  .sharecount
  {display:none !important;}
  /*布局调整*/
  .content .fl
  {width:calc(80vw - 30px)!important;}
  .article-content
  {width:calc(80vw - 30px)!important;
    margin-left:30px !important;}
  #bd_tag .tag-single,
  #bd_tag .tag-single a,
  #bd_tag .add
  {width:auto !important;}
  #area-comment .item-comment-quote
  {padding:1px !important;}
}
